main.name: Ryan Taylor
main.description: I use my background in graphic design to feed my passion as a web developer
main.bio: New Full Stack Developer who is obsessed with learning innovative ways to create applications. I am a highly creative individual who loves Graphic Design, Animation and Web Design. I am well organized with a high attention to detail due to my military background.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.description: Six month long bootcamp dedicated to designing and building web and mobile applications. Skills learned: HTML5, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handlebars.js & ReactJS.

testimonials.text: Once you have an innovation culture, even those who are not scientists or engineers - poets, actors, journalists - they, as communities, embrace the meaning of what it is to be scientifically literate. They embrace the concept of an innovation culture. They vote in ways that promote it. They don't fight science and they don't fight technology.
Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves.
